participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: caring and nurturing, with a love for stories and family time.
participant_1.background: i'm a baby delivery nurse. i walk three miles every day. my favorite way to relax is to read a book. i love disneyland and mickey mouse. i love to spend time with my family.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: adventurous and optimistic, always looking for the next experience.
participant_2.background: i have a pet fish. i like to go hiking in the mornings to see the sunset. i turned 18 years old yesterday. i just broke up with my boyfriend two months ago. my favorite color is orange.
